update sys_log
broswer = #{broswer,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
log_level = #{logLevel,jdbcType=SMALLINT},

note = #{note,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where log_id = #{logId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
